text:
Finding the vertex and x-intercepts of a quadratic function

\begin{array}{l}\n\text { Standred tamt } \quad f(x)=a(x-b)^{2}+k \quad \text { Vertex }(h, k) \\\n\qquad \begin{array}{l}\nf(x)=| 6-\frac{1}{4} x^{2} \\\nf(x)=-4(x-0)^{2} \\\n\text { Vertex }=(0,16)\n\end{array}\n\end{array}[imath]\text { Standred tamt } \quad f(x)=a(x-b)^{2}+k \quad \text { Vertex }(h, k) [/imath] [imath]\qquad \begin{array}{l}\nf(x)=| 6-\frac{1}{4} x^{2} [/imath] [imath]f(x)=-4(x-0)^{2} [/imath] [imath]\text { Vertex }=(0,16)[/imath]
